text: Lazar Lazarevich Matveev (Russian: Ла́зарь Лазаре́вич Матве́ев; born 17 April 1927) is a Russian intelligence leader and former Soviet intelligence leader. He was a senior KGB liaison officer during 1982 to 1989. He was the boss of Vladimir Putin when Putin worked for the KGB.Politike.ru | Лазарь Матвеев | http://politike.ru/termin/matveev-lazar-lazarevich.html Matveev was born in Krasnoyarsk Krai, Soviet Union. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:KGB people Category:Russian military people Category:Soviet military people Category:People from Krasnoyarsk
title: Lazar Matveev
